channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Emma Heming Willis Shares Heartfelt Roller Coaster Video with Bruce Willis: 'I Miss Him Being My Ride Companion'
item.description: "I’m pretty sure you’re not supposed to bring a camera on those rides, but I’m so glad he did," Emma Heming Willis wrote on Instagram

item.title: Jazz Jennings Poses in Bubble Bath After 100-Lb. Weight Loss
